title: Duke Nukem Forever playthrough -- Part 2
description: Finished it up. This wasn't the worst game ever, and probably not as bad as a lot of people say, buuuut it still is an extremely mediocre game. Only a few decent parts, most of the game was incredibly boring. Glad to have played it though, finally.
